snippet: Tom Steyer, the billionaire environmentalist who spent at least $57 million of his own money to influence Tuesday’s outcome, appears to have largely wasted his time and money.
abstract: Tom Steyer, the billionaire environmentalist who spent at least $57 million of his own money to influence midterm elections, more than any other Democratic donor, appears to have largely wasted his time and money; most of his candidates lost; Steyer, however, says that his money was well-spent because it put climate change on the ballot across the nation and elevated the issue to keep it on the public radar.
lead_paragraph: Tom Steyer, the billionaire environmentalist who spent at least $57 million of his own money to influence Tuesday’s outcome, appears to have largely wasted his time and money.

headline.main: Meager Returns for the Democrats’ Biggest Donor
headline.print_headline: Meager Returns for the Democrats’ Biggest Donor
